short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate an easily shareable Jira ticket summary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I often find that I need to copy the ticket number, title and link for a Jira ticket so I can paste it in Slack. This extension generates that one line summary for you so you can easily copy it and paste elsewhere. 

It is only designed to work on pages that have the URL format:
org_name.atlassian.net/browse/TICKET
